reviews.text:
I liked chicken shawarma  
I ordered fries fried with garlic sauce it was perfect
and my order was ready before the time.
It will do in a pinch but don't expect to be blown away. Portion sizes are good but flavors are meh. The falafel has a nice crunch and isn't greasy, though!...
Had a chicken bowl with lettuce, tomatoes, onion, and tzatziki. Delicious! So filling too. I walked right in and was serviced and they were super nice!
